content:
etc/emotionexpressiondata.etc
里面增加

33 1`Common/EmotionExpression/vip_01.ani``Common/EmotionExpression/vip_01.ani`001`心悦1``-心悦1``$END`


33为ID 可以一直增加 ani自己随便搓
etc/titlebook.etc
称号簿里面加一条
怎么凑条件自己看着办

[section icon]
	`Interface2/TitleBook/TitleBookIcon.img`5
[section name]
	`测试`
[reward type]
	[name]
		`發放心情狀態222`
	[image path]
		`Interface/EmotionExpression/EmotionExpressionIcon.img`10
	[give emotion]
		33
[/reward type]
